price: Nuko (Nuhu) aravuga ati “Muyinjiremo. Kugenda mu mazi kwayo no kugera ku mwaro kwayo bibe mu izina rya Allah. Mu by’ukuri Nyagasani wanjye ni Ubabarira ibyaha, Nyirimpuhwe.”
arabic: ۞ وَقَالَ ٱرۡكَبُواْ فِيهَا بِسۡمِ ٱللَّهِ مَجۡر۪ىٰهَا وَمُرۡسَىٰهَآۚ إِنَّ رَبِّي لَغَفُورٞ رَّحِيمٞ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: waqāla ir'kabū fīhā bis'mi al-lahi majrahā wamur'sāhā inna rabbī laghafūrun raḥīmun
